captions.text: I heard you guys are working overtime tonight because of us

We're getting old
we're now in our late 20s
I got cramps in my leg!
We should change our age on profile

Hello, this is 2PM
and we're back with 'Go Crazy'

#ashtag interview
Artists pick keywords about themselves
A lot of people say 'Are you crazy?' in these days

How can you write something like this?
Are you crazy?
You can say 'Are you crazy' after going on the rides
Sure, you can also say it when you're eating marinated crab
I wanted to use it as a title and make a song about it

So I came up with this song and
all members went crazy
He begs me to go drink somewhere else
We're trying not to lose our original intention
Q. What are you crazy about in these days?
I keep thinking about it because of this dance move
Q. Show us the motorcycle dance~
I think Jun.K is crazy about fans response
Of course, everyone had great energy so it came out nice
but if it didn't rank high on the music chart then
I would feel like it's because of me
No, but you're actually the one to blame
Actually he asked me, "Will this be a hit?"
He says "Wow look at all these comments" everyday
People might say 'Idols go to club?'
You know that well but went clubbing?
We're differentiating ourselves from the promotion
I even take notes when he goes out
Of course, you should take notes
I'm good at working the crowd up
I like to play hard at parties
What kind of hangover do you have?
He once spit out blood on the bed
I drank a lot that day
I had some wine and then
I was looking for something similar in color<Br>so I had raspberry wine

I thought 'Where am I?' and then
I have this one memory..
There's no chunks, just the wine
My mom thought it was funny too
That's it, that's the worst case
It's our world tour, Go Crazy
We're known as 'Beast-idol' with a lot of songs
This time we arranged the songs like crazy
We also came up with units
We'll try something new as units

We worked hard for this album so
Please look forward to it
Our fans sent us what they want say to 2PM in six letters
We never get sick if we think about our fans
We keep doing this dance move from the beginning to the end
So which one do you think would hurt more?
6 years for idol.. we still have a long way to go
As we worked overseas, we rarely worked in Korea
So fans have been waiting for such a long time
We feel so thankful and sorry at the same time
This interview feels like 2PM's life theater
On stage I always felt like setting myself on fire

I think if you understand the fact that we're ready
and willing to throw ourselves to do best on stage
Then, it will help us grow more as artists
I hope you guys can watch us grow

No matter how much time passes,
our goal is to enjoy doing music
We would like to be 2PM and be with our fans for long

I had such a great time today
talking about us honestly
Until now, we were 2PM! Thank you
